content.text: Here's the Van Westendorp chart based on your data:

This chart shows four price points:

1. Point of Marginal Cheapness (PMC): $22.50
2. Point of Marginal Expensiveness (PME): $32.00
3. Optimal Price Point (OPP): $27.25
4. Indifference Price Point (IPP): $29.75

The acceptable price range is therefore $22.50 to $32.00.
